original: Sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ, sā ca na maggoti?

analyzed: pubbā iva kho panassa kāya kammam vacī kammam ājīvo su parisuddhaḥ hoti

original: evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī”ti.

original: “yasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi
analyzed: yasmin kho subhadda dhamma vinaye ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ na upalabbhati samaṇaḥ api

analyzed: tattha na upalabbhati dutiyaḥ pi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati tatiyaḥ pi tattha samaṇo

original: na upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati.
analyzed: na upalabbhati catutthaḥ api tattha samaṇaḥ na upalabbhati

original: Yasmiñca kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha upalabbhati, dutiyopi …pe… tatiyopi …pe… catutthopi tattha samaṇo upalabbhati.

original: Imasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati. Idheva, subhadda,
analyzed: imasmin kho subhadda dhamma vinaye ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggo upalabbhati idha iva subhadda

original: samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha catuttho samaṇo. Suññā parappavādā
analyzed: samaṇaḥ idha dutiyaḥ samaṇaḥ idha tatiyaḥ samaṇaḥ idha catuttho samaṇaḥ suññā parappavādā
